lead_paragraph: The United States trade deficit rose in February to the highest level in six months, $47.1 billion, a 2.6 percent increase from January.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Exports More Cars, but Trade Deficit Grows
headline.main: U.S. Exports More Cars, but Trade Deficit Grows

snippet: The United States trade deficit rose in February to the highest level in six months, $47.1 billion, a 2.6 percent increase from January.
abstract: Commerce Dept reports United States trade deficit rose 2.6 percent in February from January to $47.1 billion, highest level in six months.
